description:
Guillermo Rauch


The traditional chat application hasn't changed much in the past three decades.

The speed at which we communicate can be greatly enhanced by rethinking some fundamental paradigms. This talk will explore the evolution of instant messaging, and how Node.JS, Socket.IO and React.JS can enable it.
